title: Authors and Citation
text: Saldanha R (2023). brpop: Brazilian Population Estimatives. R package version 0.3.0, https://rfsaldanha.github.io/brpop/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {brpop: Brazilian Population Estimatives},   author = {Raphael Saldanha},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.3.0},   url = {https://rfsaldanha.github.io/brpop/}, }

title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: brpop R package provides yearly (2000 2021) Brazilian population estimates DataSUS/Brazilian Health Ministry, aggregated state, municipality, sex, age groups. estimates especially useful calculating age sex standardized disease rates. population estimates downloaded manually DataSUS website converted tibbles convenient use. population estimation method can accessed .

title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: Stable release CRAN. Development version GitHub.

title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: package provides population estimates municipalities, UF health regions sex age groups. base dataset population estimates municipalities sex. package provides several functions aggregate datasets multiple ways. functions provided municipalities prefix mun_, UFs prefix uf_, health regions prefix regsaude_. function takes arguments.

what: Estimates by year, sex and age group
title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: functions *_sex_pop binds estimates sex single tibble new variable called sex.

what: Estimates by year and age group
title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: functions *_pop aggregates municipalities’ estimates sex, resulting tibble overall population estimates.

title: Brazilian Population Estimatives
text: functions *_pop_totals provides total population estimative.

title: brpop 0.3.0
text: Bug correction mun_reg_saude: remove duplicated records. Add arguments reg_saude_* functions use 449 units health region version.

text: Bug correction uf_pop_totals regsaude_pop_totals.
